1: -module(mafiapp_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -export([init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, all/0, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
    4: -export([add_service/1, friend_by_name/1, friend_with_services/1, friend_by_expertise/1, accounts/1, enemies/1]).
    5: 
    6: 
    7: all() -> [add_service, friend_by_name, friend_with_services, friend_by_expertise, accounts, enemies].
    8: 
    9: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   10: 	Priv = ?config(piv_dir, Config),
   11: 	application:set_env(mnesia, dir, Priv),
   12: 	mafiapp:install([node()]),
   13: 	application:start(mnesia),
   14: 	application:start(mafiapp),
   15: 	Config.
   16: 
   17: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   18: 	application:stop(mnesia),
   19: 	ok.
   20: 
   21: init_per_testcase(add_service, Config) ->
   22: 	Config;
   23: init_per_testcase(accounts, Config) ->
   24: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Consigliere", [], [you], consigliere),
   25: 	Config;
   26: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   27: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Don Corleone", [], [boss], boss),
   28: 	Config.
   29: 
   30: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
   31: 	ok.
   32: 
   33: enemies(_Config) ->
   34: 	undefined = mafiapp:find_enemy("Edward"),
   35: 	ok = mafiapp:add_enemy("Edward", [{bio, "Vampire"},{comment, "He sucks (blood)"}]),
   36: 	{"Edward", [{bio,"Vampire"}, {comment, "He sucks (blood)"}]} = mafiapp:find_enemy("Edward"),
   37: 	ok = mafiapp:enemy_killed("Edward"),
   38: 	undefined = mafiapp:find_enemy("Edward").
   39: 
   40: accounts(_Config) ->
   41: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Gill Bates", [{email, "ceo@microhard.com"}], [clever, rich], computers),
   42: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Consigliere", "Gill Bates", {1985,11,20}, "Bought 15 copies of software"),
   43: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Gill Bates", "Consigliere", {1986,8,17}, "Made computer faster"),
   44: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Pierre Gauthier", [{other, "city arena"}], [{job, "sports team GM"}], sports),
   45: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Pierre Gauthier", "Consigliere", {2009,6,30}, "Took on a huge, bad contract"),
   46: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Wayne Gretzky", [{other, "Canada"}], [{born, {1961,1,26}}, "hocky legend"], hockey),
   47: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Consigliere", "Wayne Gretzky", {1964,1,26}, "Gave first pair of ice skates"),
   48: 	[{-1, "Wayne Gretzky"},
   49: 	 {0, "Gill Bates"},
   50: 	 {1, "Pierre Gauthier"}] = mafiapp:debts("Consigliere"),
   51: 	[{1, "Consigliere"}] = mafiapp:debts("Wayne Gretzky").
   52: 
   53: friend_by_expertise(_Config) ->
   54: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("A Red Panda",
   55: 							[{location, "in a zoo"}],
   56: 							[animal,cute],
   57: 							climbing),
   58: 	[{"A Red Panda", _Contact, _Info, climbing, _Services}] = mafiapp:friend_by_expertise(climbing),
   59: 	[] = mafiapp:friend_by_expertise(make_ref()).
   60: 
   61: 
   62: add_service(_Config) ->
   63: 	{error, unknown_friend} = mafiapp:add_service("from_name",
   64: 													"to_name",
   65: 													{1946,5,23},
   66: 													"a fake service"),
   67: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Don Corleone", [], [boss], boss),
   68: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Alan Parsons",
   69: 							[{twitter, "@ArtScienceSound"}],
   70: 							[{born, {1948,12,20}},
   71: 							musician, 'audio engineer',
   72: 							producer, 'has projects'], mixing),
   73: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Alan Parsons", "Don Corleone", {1973,3,1}, "Helped releasea Pink Floyd album").
   74: 
   75: friend_by_name(_Config) ->
   76: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Pete Cityshend",
   77: 								[{phone, "418-542-3000"},
   78: 								 {email, "test@example.com"},
   79: 								 {other, "yell real loud!"}],
   80: 								 [{born, {1945,5,19}}, musician, popular], music),
   81: 	{"Pete Cityshend", _Contact, _Info, music, _Services} = mafiapp:friend_by_name("Pete Cityshend"),
   82: 	undefined = mafiapp:friend_by_name(make_ref()).
   83: 
   84: friend_with_services(_Config) ->
   85: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Someone", [{other, "at the fruit stand"}],[weird,mysterious], shadiness),
   86: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Don Corleone", "Someone", {1949,2,14}, "Increased business"),
   87: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Someone", "Don Corleone", {1949,12,25}, "Gave a Christmas gift"),
   88: 	%%we dont care about order
   89: 	{"Someone", _Contact, _Info, shadiness, [{from, "Don Corleone", {1949,2,14}, "Increased business"}, 
   90: 		{to, "Don Corleone", {1949,12,25}, "Gave a Christmas gift"}]} = mafiapp:friend_by_name("Someone").
